T02D3368:42b-1: kal pokta ma ku ru kulla s'a dha nam /
T02D3368:42b-3: rtog pa las gsungs pa'i lha mo rigs byed ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D3368:42b-4: 'phags ma rigs byed ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3368:42b-5: gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D3368:42b-6: lha dang lha min mir bcas pa //
T02D3368:42b-7: nges par ci bgyi byed pa yi //
T02D3368:42b-8: sgrol ma de la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D3368:42b-9: dang po re zhig sngags pas yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su /
T02D3368:42b-10: bud med kyi skye bo dang tshogs pa la sogs
T02D3368:42b-11: pas dben par nang par stan bde ba la 'dug
T02D3368:42b-12: ste / rang gi snying gar dbyangs yig dang po
T02D3368:42b-13: yongs su gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D3368:42b-14: du 'od zer dang bcas pa'i yi ge hr'i:sa bon
T02D3368:42b-15: las byung ba'i 'od zer dmar po'i tshogs kyis 'gro
T02D3368:42b-16: ba gsal bar byas pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i rigs
T02D3368:42b-17: byed ma'i ri la gnas pa'i rigs byed ma /
T02D3368:42b-18: bcom ldan 'das ma bskul nas spyan drangs nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la yang dag par bltas te /
T02D3368:42b-19: snying ga'i sa bon las sprul pa'i me tog dang
T02D3368:42b-20: spos la sogs pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod
T02D3368:42b-21: par bya'o // de'i rjes la phyag btsal ba dang /
T02D3368:42b-23: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3368:42b-25: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3368:42b-26: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D3368:42b-27: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D3368:43a-0: sdig pa thams cad so sor @43a * //
T02D3368:43a-2: 'gro ba'i bsod nams rjes yi rang //
T02D3368:43a-3: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D3368:43a-4: zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod do //
T02D3368:43a-5: de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa sngon du
T02D3368:43a-6: 'gro bas chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par
T02D3368:43a-7: bsgom par bya'o // de nas byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D3368:43a-8: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes so //
T02D3368:43a-9: de nas 'gro ba sdug bsngal mtha' dag snying rje bsgoms la /
T02D3368:43a-10: rang gi sems sa bon gyi gzugs su bltas te /
T02D3368:43a-11: de yongs su gyur pa las autpa la dmar po'i
T02D3368:43a-12: steng du dbyangs yig dang po yongs su gyur pa'i
T02D3368:43a-13: zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon gyi 'od zer
T02D3368:43a-14: rnams kyis sngon bzhin du 'gro ba snang bar bya
T02D3368:43a-15: ste / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dpag tu med pa rnams bskul te /
T02D3368:43a-16: spyan drangs la bstim par bya ste /
T02D3368:43a-17: de la autpa la la sogs pa yongs su gyur
T02D3368:43a-18: pa las sku mdog dmar po padma dmar po dang
T02D3368:43a-19: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa /
T02D3368:43a-20: na bza' dmar pos stod g-yogs byas pa /
T02D3368:43a-21: 'od zer dmar po dang ldan pa /
T02D3368:43a-22: rin po che'i rna rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02D3368:43a-25: g-yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa /
T02D3368:43a-27: g-yon pas rin po che'i gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02D3368:43a-28: gnyis pas autpa la dmar po 'dzin pa /
T02D3368:43a-29: 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can /
T02D3368:43a-30: rigs byed ma'i ri phug na gnas pa'i sgra gcan
T02D3368:43a-31: gyi mgo bo la gnas pa'i chung ma dang bcas
T02D3368:43a-32: pa'i 'dod pa'i lha'i steng na gnas pa /
T02D3368:43a-33: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams 'phel ba'i dbang dang ldan pa /
T02D3368:43a-34: dang po'i lang tsho dang ldan pa'i rigs byed mar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3368:43a-35: de ltar dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed nas slar yang
T02D3368:43a-36: skad cig tsam gyis ye shes sems dpa' mdun du
T02D3368:43a-37: bkug la yang dag par mchod de /
T02D3368:43a-38: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas zhal nas gzhug par bya'o //
T02D3368:43a-39: de la dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D3368:43a-40: thal mo sbyar la gung mo gnyis rtse mor byas
T02D3368:43a-41: la srin lag gnyis nang du gzhug / mdzub mo
T02D3368:43a-42: gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu sbyar la /
T02D3368:43a-43: mtheb chen gnyis 'og tu byas pa de lta bu'i rnam pa'i autpa la'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3368:43a-45: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
T02D3368:43a-46: mchod chen ji ltar cher byin pa //
T02D3368:43b-0: bdag la bsrung @43b ba'i don gyi phyir //
T02D3368:43b-1: nam mkha' rdo rje bdag la stsol //
T02D3368:43b-3: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni //
T02D3368:43b-4: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02D3368:43b-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02D3368:43b-6: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
T02D3368:43b-7: 'di ltar brjod pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi bkas spyan ma la sogs pas dbang bskur bas /
T02D3368:43b-8: dbu rgyan du snang ba mtha' yas bsam par bya'o //
T02D3368:43b-9: de ltar bsgoms la bzlas pa byas te /
T02D3368:43b-13: phyi mo dman par ma yin /
T02D3368:43b-14: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa spangs te /
T02D3368:43b-15: aom ku ru kulle hr'i:h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3368:43b-16: de ltar thun mtshams gsum gyi rim pas /
T02D3368:43b-18: sha ka ra la sogs pa'i gtor ma sbyin pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D3368:43b-19: gus pas yun ring por bsam pa brtan pos zla
T02D3368:43b-20: ba drug tu bsgom par byas na grub pa'i mtshan
T02D3368:43b-22: de nas zla ba dang po la nad la sogs
T02D3368:43b-23: pa'i gnod pa brgya nye par 'ong bar 'gyur ro
T02D3368:43b-24: // gnyis pa la ston mo yid du 'ong ba ma bslangs par rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3368:43b-25: gsum pa la gos sna tshogs rnyed pa dang /
T02D3368:43b-26: bzhi pa la sna tshogs kyi so rtsi rgyun mi 'chad par rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D3368:43b-27: lnga pa la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs la
T02D3368:43b-28: sogs pa'i yon tan gyis brgyan pa'i bud med kyi
T02D3368:43b-29: tshogs dang phrad pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3368:43b-30: drug pa la lha dang klu dang dri za la
T02D3368:43b-31: sogs pa bud med mdzes ma dang phrad par 'gyur
T02D3368:43b-32: ro // phal cher bcom ldan 'das ma bsgoms na bud med rnams kyis 'tsho bar byed do //
T02D3368:43b-33: de la bdud kyi las 'di rnams spangs te /
T02D3368:43b-34: bcom ldan 'das ma sgom par byed pa la dngos su 'am /
T02D3368:43b-35: rmi lam du ston par 'gyur te /
T02D3368:43b-44: sa 'og la sogs pa'i dngos grub la sogs pa 'dod pa rnams grub par byed do //
T02D3368:43b-45: gal te bstan par ma gyur na sngar brjod pa'i phyag rgya bcing ste /
T02D3368:43b-48: zla ba drug gi bar du nya'i nub mo thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D3368:43b-49: de nas phyag rgya 'bar te 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D3368:43b-50: phyag rgya des tshangs pa dang /
T02D3368:44a-0: @44a * // sred med kyi bu la sogs pa bkug nas 'ongs te /
T02D3368:44a-1: pho nyar gyur nas sgrub pa po'i 'dod pa rdzogs par byed do //
T02D3368:44a-2: de nas bzung ste skye ba dang /
T02D3368:44a-5: 'chi ba dang bral te 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
T02D3368:44a-6: du song nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ste
T02D3368:44a-7: / sa dang gzungs la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D3368:44a-8: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rim pa /
T02D3368:44a-9: ku ru ku le'i sgrub thabs slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02D3368:44a-10: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
